General.Name: Ennoconn Corp
General.Description: Ennoconn Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells data storage, processing equipment and industrial motherboard, network communication, and facility electromechanical system products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company primarily provides industrial embedded motherboards and modules, embedded computer systems, embedded box computers, 5G computing platform, and 4K/8K displays. It is involved in the research, development, and sale of software and hardware products; research, development, production, and sale of electronic materials for hardware and software products; manufacturing, wholesale, import/export, and servicing of software and hardware related to industrial computers and industrial control systems; and wholesale of electronic materials, as well as provision of installation, debugging, and technical consultation services. The company also engages in the intelligent technology development and sale of hardware; wholesale and retail of telecommunications control of radio frequency equipment input and information software; research, design, and sale of mobile payment, electronic signature, and information security products; sale of network storage equipment and maintenance services; and import and export trading activities. In addition, it offers electronic components, computer and peripheral equipment, multimedia products, molds, servers, communication machinery and equipment, spare parts, and after-sales services; and information software services. The company provides its products and services for the use in various applications, including smart industrial control, smart retail, smart gaming, network security, smart home, smart transportation, and smart city fields. Ennoconn Corporation was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.10, Jiankang Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23586
